name: Where the Game Comes From
description:
To shoot go to hackdevice and type: canShoot = true;

to jump go to hackdevice and type: canjump = true;

Once upon a time... That really wasn't , a guy named Rootter who during one afternoon he knocked his cat companion off the bed, something incredible happened The cat fell backwards At that moment, Rootter discovered that he was living in a simulation. Rootter saw an opportunity, since his life is someone generic, a nobody, a mediocre person who was not allowed to achieve a nything in that simulation in that game If he could find out where does the game come from I could finish it He set out to hack and search.

Credits: 

Luis Ochoa: Programmer/Game designer

Mauricio: Art
